ud5.5:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde.
ud5.5:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisinno hoti.
ud5.5:2.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā,
ud5.5:2.1_2: uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
ud5.5:2.2_0: “abhikkantā, bhante, ratti; nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo; ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho;
ud5.5:3.1_0: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā,
ud5.5:3.1_2: uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
ud5.5:3.2_0: “abhikkantā, bhante, ratti; nikkhanto majjhimo yāmo; ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho;
ud5.5:4.1_0: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā,
ud5.5:4.1_3: nandimukhiyā rattiyā uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
ud5.5:5.2_0: “kaṁ nu kho bhagavā puggalaṁ sandhāya evamāha:
ud5.5:5.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno sabbāvantaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ cetasā ceto paricca manasākāsi.
ud5.5:5.5_0: Addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṁ puggalaṁ dussīlaṁ pāpadhammaṁ asuciṁ saṅkassarasamācāraṁ paṭicchannakammantaṁ
ud5.5:5.5_1: assamaṇaṁ samaṇapaṭiññaṁ abrahmacāriṁ brahmacāripaṭiññaṁ antopūtiṁ avassutaṁ kasambujātaṁ majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinnaṁ.
ud5.5:5.6_0: Disvāna uṭṭhāyāsanā yena so puggalo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ puggalaṁ etadavoca:
ud5.5:5.9_0: Evaṁ vutte, so puggalo tuṇhī ahosi.
ud5.5:6.1_0: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṁ puggalaṁ etadavoca:
ud5.5:6.5_0: tatiyampi kho so puggalo tuṇhī ahosi.
ud5.5:7.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṁ puggalaṁ bāhāyaṁ gahetvā bahidvārakoṭṭhakā nikkhāmetvā sūcighaṭikaṁ datvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud5.5:7.6_0: Yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāma so moghapuriso āgamessatī”ti.
ud5.5:8.2_0: “na dānāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ito paraṁ uposathaṁ karissāmi, pātimokkhaṁ uddisissāmi.
ud5.5:8.3_0: Tumheva dāni, bhikkhave, ito paraṁ uposathaṁ kareyyātha, pātimokkhaṁ uddiseyyātha.
ud5.5:8.4_2: anavakāso yaṁ tathāgato aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṁ kareyya,
ud5.5:9.1_3: ye disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:10.1_0: Mahāsamuddo, bhikkhave, anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro, na āyatakeneva papāto.
ud5.5:10.2_0: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro na āyatakeneva papāto;
ud5.5:10.3_3: yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:11.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṁ nātivattati.
ud5.5:11.2_0: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṁ nātivattati;
ud5.5:11.3_3: yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:12.1_3: Yaṁ hoti mahāsamudde mataṁ kuṇapaṁ taṁ khippameva tīraṁ vāheti,
ud5.5:12.2_3: yaṁ hoti mahāsamudde mataṁ kuṇapaṁ taṁ khippameva tīraṁ vāheti thalaṁ ussāreti;
ud5.5:12.3_3: yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:13.1_4: tā mahāsamuddaṁ patvā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni;
ud5.5:13.2_3: seyyathidaṁ—gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahī tā mahāsamuddaṁ patvā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni,
ud5.5:13.3_3: yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:14.1_2: yā ca loke savantiyo mahāsamuddaṁ appenti,
ud5.5:14.1_4: na tena mahāsamuddassa ūnattaṁ vā pūrattaṁ vā paññāyati.
ud5.5:14.2_2: yā ca loke savantiyo mahāsamuddaṁ appenti,
ud5.5:14.2_4: na tena mahāsamuddassa ūnattaṁ vā pūrattaṁ vā paññāyati;
ud5.5:14.3_3: yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:15.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ekaraso loṇaraso.
ud5.5:15.3_3: yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:16.1_4: seyyathidaṁ—muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṁ rajataṁ jātarūpaṁ lohitaṅgo masāragallaṁ.
ud5.5:16.2_4: seyyathidaṁ—muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṁ rajataṁ jātarūpaṁ lohitaṅgo masāragallaṁ;
ud5.5:16.3_3: yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:17.1_3: Tatrime bhūtā—timi timiṅgalo timitimiṅgalo asurā nāgā gandhabbā.
ud5.5:17.2_3: tatrime bhūtā—timi timiṅgalo timitimiṅgalo asurā nāgā gandhabbā,
ud5.5:17.2_4: santi mahāsamudde yojanasatikāpi attabhāvā dviyojanasatikāpi attabhāvā …pe…
ud5.5:17.3_3: yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:17.4_2: aṭṭha mahāsamudde acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ye disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:18.1_2: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā,
ud5.5:18.1_3: ye disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
ud5.5:19.4_2: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo,
ud5.5:19.4_3: yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
ud5.5:20.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṁ nātivattati;
ud5.5:20.2_2: yaṁ mayā sāvakānaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ taṁ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamanti.
ud5.5:20.3_0: Yampi, bhikkhave, mayā sāvakānaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ taṁ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamanti;
ud5.5:20.4_2: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo,
ud5.5:20.4_3: yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
ud5.5:21.1_3: yaṁ hoti mahāsamudde mataṁ kuṇapaṁ taṁ khippameva tīraṁ vāheti,
ud5.5:21.2_2: yo so puggalo dussīlo pāpadhammo asuci saṅkassarasamācāro paṭicchannakammanto assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño
ud5.5:21.2_5: atha kho naṁ khippameva sannipatitvā ukkhipati.
ud5.5:21.2_6: Kiñcāpi so hoti majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinno,
ud5.5:21.3_2: yo so puggalo dussīlo pāpadhammo asuci saṅkassarasamācāro paṭicchannakammanto assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño
ud5.5:21.3_6: Kiñcāpi so hoti majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinno,
ud5.5:21.4_2: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo,
ud5.5:21.4_3: yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
ud5.5:22.1_3: seyyathidaṁ—gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahī tā mahāsamuddaṁ patvā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni,
ud5.5:22.2_3: suddā te tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitvā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni,
ud5.5:22.3_3: suddā te tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitvā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni,
ud5.5:22.4_2: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo,
ud5.5:22.4_3: yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
ud5.5:23.1_2: yā ca loke savantiyo mahāsamuddaṁ appenti,
ud5.5:23.1_4: na tena mahāsamuddassa ūnattaṁ vā pūrattaṁ vā paññāyati;
ud5.5:23.2_2: bahū cepi bhikkhū anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyanti,
ud5.5:23.2_3: na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṁ vā pūrattaṁ vā paññāyati.
ud5.5:23.3_2: bahū cepi bhikkhū anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyanti,
ud5.5:23.3_3: na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṁ vā pūrattaṁ vā paññāyati;
ud5.5:23.4_2: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye pañcamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo,
ud5.5:23.4_3: yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
ud5.5:24.2_0: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, ayaṁ dhammavinayo ekaraso vimuttiraso.
ud5.5:24.3_0: Yampi, bhikkhave, ayaṁ dhammavinayo ekaraso vimuttiraso;
ud5.5:24.4_2: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye chaṭṭho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo,
ud5.5:24.4_3: yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
ud5.5:25.1_4: seyyathidaṁ—muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṁ rajataṁ jātarūpaṁ lohitaṅgo masāragallaṁ;
ud5.5:25.4_2: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo,
ud5.5:25.4_3: yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
ud5.5:26.1_3: tatrime bhūtā—timi timiṅgalo timitimiṅgalo asurā nāgā gandhabbā,
ud5.5:26.1_4: santi mahāsamudde yojanasatikāpi attabhāvā dviyojanasatikāpi attabhāvā tiyojanasatikāpi attabhāvā catuyojanasatikāpi
ud5.5:26.2_2: ayaṁ dhammavinayo mahataṁ bhūtānaṁ āvāso;tatrime bhūtā—sotāpanno,
ud5.5:26.4_2: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye aṭṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo,
ud5.5:26.4_3: yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
ud5.5:26.5_2: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā,
ud5.5:26.5_3: ye disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramantī”ti.
ud5.5:27.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
